title: Friendship Hill National Historic Site: Indoor Activities
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Indoor Activities               Indoor Activities         The Visitor Center at Friendship Hill is in a post-Gallatin era addition to the house.   Tour the Gallatin House Self-guided tour: The portions of the house from the Gallatin era are open to the public.  The rooms contain exhibits and some furnishings relating to the period of Gallatin's life when the addition was built.
